title: "Plat Elo"

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: You'd think by now at this elo people would know how to play the game without being that... bad...

replies.body:
Looks like you did nothing to help your team though. There's a difference between afk farming/not feeding and carrying your team.
Team game bro :)

Oh god the irony of this post. I took top T1, T2 and inhib tower, took top inhibitor then took BOTH nexus towers. I then did the same to bot, taking T2 and Inhib tower + inhib. We managed to lose when I single handily took 2 inhibitors and box nexus towers. Alright then.

First of all http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=qelal
"Normal" which sorta means you are gold 2, not plat.

Secondly http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/76060584/201118358?tab=overview
From the looks of things you managed to get a few towers and inhibs WITH your team, only once was there a fight around the time of the tower dropping. I didn't see the game, and your team did badly but there's always potential to carry, especially since Lee Sin and LB got kills too(without any assist by you at all), they weren't totally useless. You didn't eclipse your team mates, you just played better.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/75754310/200021259?tab=overview
This wasnt ranked, but if the game looks like that you can maybe claim there's nothing you can do to carry.

> [{quoted}](name=Jackbar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AE2N0sRA,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T10:52:04.889+0000)

> First of all http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=qelal
> "Normal" which sorta means you are gold 2, not plat.

> Secondly http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/76060584/201118358?tab=overview
> From the looks of things you managed to get a few towers and inhibs WITH your team, only once was there a fight around the time of the tower dropping. I didn't see the game, and your team did badly but there's always potential to carry, especially since Lee Sin and LB got kills too(without any assist by you at all), they weren't totally useless. You didn't eclipse your team mates, you just played better.
> 
> http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/75754310/200021259?tab=overview
> This wasnt ranked, but if the game looks like that you can maybe claim there's nothing you can do to carry.

When I checked, it was around 1550, lol, which is barely gold. What a fool.

Gold II...

Plat elo? 

Most of the people in that game were gold 3 - 5, Vayne was the only plat, and he probably got boosted, or just had a bad game, or laning with the gold 5 morg was too hard.

tl;dr, don't claim it's plat elo when it's gold 4 elo. noob.
Please do take a look at my MMR before commenting nonsense. "Noob".

> [{quoted}](name=Qelal,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AE2N0sRA,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-01-19T10:37:23.756+0000)
>
> Please do take a look at my MMR before commenting nonsense. "Noob".

I did, you certainly do not have plat mmr. You barely have mid gold mmr.

This just in folks, getting matched with gold 3 - gold 5, means you have plat MMR. I must have diamond MMR then.
Malphite looks like the only 1 even worthy of that elo...
There are bad players bronze-challenger, wot r u complaining about m8

it never ceases to amaze me how there's one game where you do well and everyone else doesn't, and people proceed to screenshot the scores to prove that point. As if you haven't fed in a ranked game before and got carried. Git gud
lol I lost with that sej in my team yesterday
it was your fault for losing
